Name: Sannl Water
Specialty: Vicissitude. You were once the scion of a wealthy family who lost their entire fortune in the blink of an eye.
Trait: I indulge vice in excess to quiet my conscience.
Ideal: Order. The will of the crown is absolute. (Law)
Bond: The job is all that matters. I will see it through.
Flaw: I go a bit mad when I see blood.
Equipment: ['Scale Mail', 'Dagger', 'Mace', "Dungeoneer's Pack", 'Longbow', '20 Arrows', 'Quiver', 'Set of Common Clothes', 'Black Cloak with Hood', "Poisoner's Kit", '10 GP']

Name: Ljam Ambershard
Trait: I see omens in every event and action. The gods try to speak to us, we just need to listen.
Ideal: Change. We must help bring about the changes the gods are constantly working in the world. (Chaotic)
Bond: I would die to recover an ancient relic of my faith that was lost long ago.
Flaw: I judge others harshly, and myself even more severely.
Equipment: ['Club', 'Scimitar', 'Leather Armor', "Explorer's Pack", 'Druidic Focus', 'Holy Symbol', 'Prayer Book or Prayer Wheel', '5 Sticks of Incense', 'Vestments', 'Set of Common Clothes', '15 GP']
Race Source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

Name: Joseth Swyft
Trait: I may have lost everything I worked for most of my life, but there's work to be done. No time to linger on the past.
Ideal: Restraint. I hate those who caused my loss. It is all I can do not to lash out at them. (Any)
Bond: I will never forget the debt owed to Glevith of the Welcomers. I will be ready to repay that debt when called upon.
Flaw: I am a sucker for the underdog, and always bet on the losing team.
Equipment: ['Shortsword', 'Shortsword', "Explorer's Pack", 'Leather Armor', '2 Daggers', "Thieves' Tools", "Set of Artisan's Tools", 'Token of Previous Life', "Set of Traveler's Clothes", '15 GP']

Name: Kathrine Blackwater
Specialty: Your family has a history of practicing the dark arts. You dabbled once and felt something horrible clutch at your soul, whereupon you fled in terror.
Trait: I put no trust in divine beings.
Ideal: Logic. I like to know my enemy’s capabilities and weaknesses before rushing into battle. (Lawful)
Bond: I have a child to protect. I must make the world a safer place for them.
Equipment: ['Shortsword', 'Shortbow', '20 Arrows', 'Quiver', "Explorer's Pack", 'Leather Armor', '2 Daggers', "Thieves' Tools", "Monster Hunter's Pack", 'Trinket of Special Significance', 'Set of Common Clothes', '1 SP']
